name: Dance with the Wolf.
description:
Dance with the Wolf.

Play as the Big Bad Wolf and try to eat as many as Red Riding Hood's on stage.

Eat Grandma's will help you to gain speed temporarily, but be careful, don't get caught by the Hunter!

No worries, it is only a show, and "it is not real".

Controls: Click on menu to start, use WASD to move.
